channel.title: Last Question(s)
channel.description:
Alright, below are all the things I would like help on...
[IMG]http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd34/generalofcap/SkillsBefore.jpg[/img] [b]How do I change the color of what the skill levels look like, as shown above?[/b]
[IMG]http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd34/generalofcap/QuestsBefore.jpg[/img] [b]Can I change the color of the Quest names?b]
[IMG]http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd34/generalofcap/MusicPlayerBefore.jpg[/img] [b]How do I change the colors of the Music Log? Also, how do I make it so I can insert options like above?[/b]
[IMG]http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd34/generalofcap/MagesBefore.jpg[/img] [b]How do I edit magic names and their descriptions?[/b]
[IMG]http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd34/generalofcap/LogOutScreenBefore.jpg[/img] [b]How do I change the color of the words, and change what I want it to say?[/b]
[IMG]http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd34/generalofcap/GameControlsBefore.jpg[/img] [b]How do I change the colors of these words?[/b]
[IMG]http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd34/generalofcap/EquipmentBefore.jpg[/img] [b]How do I change the colors of these?[/b]
[IMG]http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd34/generalofcap/EmotesBefore.jpg[/img] [b]How do I set the buttons to my liking (teleports, etc.), and change the colors of anything.[/b]
[IMG]http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd34/generalofcap/AddNPCAndShops.jpg[/img] [b]Can anyone give me an EASY step-by-step, dare I say it, tut to add NPCs, make them talk, and to make them sell things (shops)?[/b]
These pictures are directly from the Funscap3 server, and I'm just beginning to get everything down... except for these. I checked client.java, and no luck. m I doing something wrong?

look all u need to edit it is to go in the client.java look for a work or a text like that u want edit ex : the music icone text and change it what u need know is for a green color it @gre@ red is @red@ white is @whi@ […] ex if u get music it will be like that @red@m@whi@u@red@s@whi@i@red@c! u if u schear good u can edit all the server to personaly it but it not a fast thing took time

item.title: Last Question(s)
item.dc:creator: @The_General The General
item.description:
@The_General wrote:

Alright, below are all the things I would like help on…


How do I change the color of what the skill levels look like, as shown above?


[b]Can I change the color of the Quest names?b]


How do I change the colors of the Music Log? Also, how do I make it so I can insert options like above?


How do I edit magic names and their descriptions?


How do I change the color of the words, and change what I want it to say?


How do I change the colors of these words?


How do I change the colors of these?


How do I set the buttons to my liking (teleports, etc.), and change the colors of anything.


Can anyone give me an EASY step-by-step, dare I say it, tut to add NPCs, make them talk, and to make them sell things (shops)?

These pictures are directly from the Funscap3 server, and I’m just beginning to get everything down… except for these. I checked client.java, and no luck. m I doing something wrong?

Read full topic
